LanguageData.FleshmassNeuralLump.label: fleshmass neural lump
LanguageData.FleshmassNeuralLump.description: A clump of fleshmass nervous tissue and fibres. You can analyze it to find a way to kill the fleshmass heart itself.
LanguageData.FleshmassNeuralLump.comps.CompAnalyzable: Analyze the fleshmass neural sample. Once enough neural samples are collected and analyzed, you should be able to figure out a way to kill the heart.

While analyzing the fleshmass neural tissue, {PAWN_nameDef} made a breakthrough!

This biosignature responds strongly when stimulated by a specific electric pulse. If used on the fleshmass heart itself, an electric signal could cause a tachycardiac overload and kill the heart.

You can now destroy the {BIOSIGNATURE} fleshmass heart by interacting with it directly.
Can be analyzed by a colonist.
{PAWN_nameDef}(이)가 살덩이 신경 혹 분석을 끝냈습니다. 샘플은 {BIOSIGNATURE} 생명신호를 지니고 있습니다.\n\n{PAWN_nameDef}(은)는 자신이 살덩이 심장을 죽일 방법을 찾을 수 있다고 확신하지만, 먼저 신경 샘플을 더 연구해야 합니다.

{PAWN_nameDef} has finished analyzing the fleshmass neural tissue. This tissue belongs to the previously studied biosignature {BIOSIGNATURE}, so you didn't gain any new knowledge.\n\nYou can destroy the {BIOSIGNATURE} fleshmass heart by interacting with it directly and inducing a tachycardiac overload.
LanguageData.GoldenCube.label: golden cube
LanguageData.GoldenCube.description: A cube that fits snugly in the hand. Golden in color, it is always invitingly warm to the touch, like a trusted pet or a hug from a good friend. Those that look closely are rewarded for their attention, by the delightful way light plays across its welcoming surface.\n\nThe cube seems impervious to most damage.
LanguageData.GoldenCube.comps.CompStudyUnlocks.studyN: {PAWN_nameDef}'s investigation of the golden cube has revealed more. It is able to psychically influence anyone who interacts with it. Those under the cube's influence will experience extreme withdrawal if they're separated from it.\n\n{PAWN_nameDef} thinks that there may be a way to deactivate the cube, but {PAWN_pronoun} will need to study it further.

{PAWN_nameDef}'s investigation of the golden cube has revealed that it can be deactivated using an archotech shard. Doing so will destroy the cube, breaking its psychic hold over your colonists.

However, the psychic whiplash from the cube’s destruction will send any cube-interested people into a berserk rage. Those in caravans will abandon your colony entirely.

Select the golden cube to deactivate it.
LanguageData.GoldenCube.comps.CompGoldenCube.activate: Destroy the golden cube, breaking its psychic hold. This will cause any cube-interested people to enter a temporary berserk rage. If they’re in a caravan, they will be permanently lost.\n\nRequires 1 shard.
LanguageData.GoldenCube.comps.CompGoldenCube.letterDe: {PAWN_nameDef}(이)가 황금 큐브를 비활성화했습니다. 그 고무적인 힘이 사라지자, 큐브가 작은 황금 더미로 산산이 부서졌습니다.
LanguageData.GrayFleshSample.label: gray flesh sample
LanguageData.GrayFleshSample.description: This strip of human flesh is stained with a dark and gritty ferrous material. Tiny threads of metallic filament run throughout, interspersed with tiny silvery beads. Its form suggests that it sloughed off someone's body during some unnatural liquification process.
LanguageData.GrayFleshSample.comps.CompAnalyzableBios: Analyze the gray flesh sample. Once enough flesh samples are collected and analyzed, the threat's biosignature will be detectable using a surgical inspection operation, allowing you to identify its host.

While analyzing the gray flesh sample, {PAWN_nameDef} finally isolated the biosignature {BIOSIGNATURE}!

The signature emerges from the fusing of human tissue and metallic bioferrite filaments which spider through the flesh and take control of the nervous system.

You can now use the surgical inspection operation to detect {BIOSIGNATURE} in living subjects.
Can be analyzed by a colonist.

{PAWN_nameDef}(이)가 회색 살 샘플 분석을 끝냈습니다. 샘플은 {BIOSIGNATURE} 생명신호를 지니고 있습니다.

{PAWN_nameDef}(은)는 살아 있는 대상의 이 생명신호를 알아내는 방법을 배우는 중이지만, 작업을 완료하려면 더 많은 샘플이 필요합니다. 그때까지, 당신의 외과 검사는 {BIOSIGNATURE}(을)를 감지하지 못할 겁니다.

더 많은 회색 살 샘플을 모으고 분석하세요.

{PAWN_nameDef} has completed {PAWN_possessive} analysis of the gray flesh sample. It carries the previously discovered biosignature {BIOSIGNATURE}.\n\nYour colonists now understand this biosignature well enough to detect it with the surgical inspection operation.
LanguageData.Meat_Twisted.label: twisted meat
LanguageData.Meat_Twisted.description: Pieces of twisted muscle and gristle, bloated with tumorous growths. These bizarre shreds of flesh must have come from a horrific creature.
LanguageData.MonolithFragment.label: monolith fragment
LanguageData.MonolithFragment.description: A broken-off fragment of the void monolith. It can be studied to learn more about void phenomena.
LanguageData.RevenantFleshChunk.label: revenant flesh chunk
LanguageData.RevenantFleshChunk.description: A strip of leathery, desiccated flesh that sloughed off a revenant when it was harmed. The tissue oozes a dark, oily liquid.
LanguageData.RevenantFleshChunk.comps.CompAnalyzableB: Analyze the revenant flesh chunk. Analyzing this tissue sample will give you tools to track and reveal the revenant.

{PAWN_nameDef} has finished analyzing the revenant flesh chunk with biosignature {BIOSIGNATURE}.

{PAWN_pronoun} has learned more about this specific revenant's biology and its method of hiding from sight. Your colonists can now see this revenant when it is nearby.

Perhaps you'll be able to find it and kill it while it sleeps.
Can be analyzed by a colonist.

{PAWN_nameDef}(이)가 망령 살 덩어리를 {BIOSIGNATURE} 생명신호로 분석하는 일을 끝냈습니다.

{PAWN_pronoun}(은)는 이 특정한 망령의 생명 작용과 그것이 뒤에 남기는 액체를 알아내는 방법에 대해 더 많이 배웠습니다.

이 망령은 이제 도망칠 때 보이는 자국을 더 길게 남길 겁니다.

어쩌면 망령이 자는 동안 찾아서 죽일 수 있을지도 모릅니다. 망령이 뒤에 남기는 얼룩으로 망령을 추적하여, 교란 신호탄, 폭발물, EMP, 불으로 망령을 드러나게 할 수 있습니다.

{PAWN_nameDef}(이)가 망령 살 덩어리를 {BIOSIGNATURE} 생명신호로 분석하는 일을 끝냈습니다.

{PAWN_pronoun}(은)는 이 특정 망령의 생명 작용과 망령이 내는 소리에 대해 더 많이 배웠습니다. 정착민은 이제 이 망령이 근처에 있으면 들을 수 있습니다. 망령을 사냥하러 가서 가까이 가게 되면, 어떤 정착민이 들을 수 있는지 알림을 받게 될 겁니다.

어쩌면 망령이 자는 동안 찾아서 죽일 수 있을지도 모릅니다. 망령이 뒤에 남기는 얼룩으로 망령을 추적하여, 교란 신호탄, 폭발물, EMP, 불으로 망령을 드러나게 할 수 있습니다.

{PAWN_nameDef} has finished analyzing the revenant flesh chunk with the previously studied biosignature {BIOSIGNATURE}.\n\nYour colonists can now see this revenant when it is nearby. Perhaps you'll be able to find it and kill it while it's sleeping.
LanguageData.RevenantSpine.label: revenant spine
LanguageData.RevenantSpine.description:
An articulated spine-like object from a dead revenant. It is a chaotic mesh of sharpened metal spokes, twisted into a warped cage. The material appears to be rough-cast black iron smeared in a dark, slippery fluid. Anyone who peers too closely inside its jagged form is left with a skull-splitting headache.

You can destroy the spine to permanently kill the revenant.

Alternatively, you can secure it on a holding platform and wait for the revenant to re-emerge, so you can study the captured entity.
LanguageData.RevenantSpine.comps.CompHoldingPlatformT: After {PAWN_nameDef} chained the revenant spine to a holding platform, the revenant re-emerged.\n\nWhen killed, a revenant's body dissolves, leaving behind only its archotechnological spine. This cage of slick iron waits for a chance to grow a new body.
LanguageData.RevenantSpine.comps.CompUsable.useMessag: {PAWN_nameDef} smashed the revenant spine. It dissolved to reveal a shard of dark archotechnology.
LanguageData.RevenantSpine.comps.CompRevenantSpine.ac: Smash the revenant spine to prevent it reforming into a new revenant.
LanguageData.Shard.label: shard
LanguageData.Shard.description: A scavenged fragment of dark archotechnology. Originally created by a hyperintelligent archotech mind, this shard is packed with technology beyond human comprehension. It is capable of manipulating psychic flows, inducing archotech influences and more esoteric outcomes. While it is useless by itself, it can be built into devices that harness its power to produce exotic effects.
